extendedInfo.description: Valentine Day live Wallpaper in 3D cube. We sparkle in some particle and lighting effects, to sweeten the mood. List of feature include:Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.

reviews.title: Love Makes Life WORTH LIVING...
reviews.comment: ...NOT merely \"so much better\". If this lukewarm \"declaration of love\" were stronger, I\'d keep this lovely LWP, but it, and the disjointed mishmash of words on the alternate design, leave me cold.
reviews.author: A Google User
